* Iron Raptor slashed the energy sword towards Zardus again but then was suddenly over taken by the massive amount of fire upon her.
Without even a sound the earth seemed to explode around her, dirt and gravel spreying up all around her.
The charges were too much for the fembot, there was no hope to win this battle.
Her sword was stot from her hand, the fingers numb and loosing their feeling as individual charges hit her within ghte fire bell.
Iron Raptor snapped her head in all directions but she could not see the enemy, a charge sent from, Pit knew who, hit her in the back and sent her sprawling onto her stomach.
She shook her head and then tried to rais when she was swamped with charges again, there was just no winning in this situation.
With silence her systems began to short out, finally being able to stand after the ball of fire cleared.
Iron Raptor stood lookinh at Zardus for a moment before she then slumped to her knees, she had been defeated even before the real battle began!
She sighed as he internal computer then ran a scan of her systems but then fuzzed to a stop before it could be completed...her systems slamming into stasis lock.
A dull thud was heard as Iron Raptor's body fell against the ground, her armor damaged and without repair.*
